content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone furnace setup at position (1, 1) and (3, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (1.0, 1.0)) with a status of working, currently smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone furnace (position (3.0, 0.0)) with a status of no ingredients to smelt, currently lacking coal.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient fuel
- Ensure that there is enough coal or other fuel in your inventory to insert into the stone furnaces. Monitor fuel levels regularly to avoid running out during smelting operations.

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Make sure to check the status of the furnaces before inserting items. If a furnace has no ingredients or is full, it will not accept more items.
